text:

what else is missing ? masala??

author: తిక్క శంకరుడు
text:
Ram did not ask Sita to come along to forest. 
She took the initiative.
She didn't listen to Ram when insisted of potential problems in forest. 
Even when Ram said it was fake deer.
Even when lakshmana asked not to cross line.

How come she be ideal who doesn't listen?

author: తిక్క శంకరుడు
text:
of course beliefs are beliefs but some of them are funny.

"GOD eat this banana" 
"I'm not hungry"
"No, you HAVE to eat. my prosperity depends on it"

"GOD Bless You" https://t.co/hCsqDLP8dH

author: తిక్క శంకరుడు
text:
'act' has multiple meanings.

take action - is to do the job, duty.
to act - is to play a role.
act - is the law of a land.

author: తిక్క శంకరుడు
text:
we can't cry on some of our problems. 

It's not coz the pain is less but coz deep down we know it's temporary and it will pass
